summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4218 for the improvement of Charles Street, from 20th Avenue South to 21st Avenue South; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50101, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
